summary.span: 將關聯的 之 屬性和 屬性陣列複製至這兩個指定的陣列。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`startIndex`和`endIndex`複製指定的路徑資料範圍的參數。Use the `startIndex` and `endIndex` parameters to copy a specified range of the path data. ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形路徑。Creates a graphics path. - 填入幾個基本類型和一些標記。Populates it with several primitives and some markers. - 列出在螢幕左邊的路徑資料。Lists the path data on the left side of the screen. - 建立和倒轉它。Creates a and rewinds it. - 遞增至第二個標記的 path 資料索引。Increments the path data index to the second marker. - 呼叫方法，將複製路徑所包含的資料之間的開始和結束點編製索引和型別陣列。Calls the method to copy the path data contained between the start and end indexes to the points and types arrays. - 列出此複製的資料，在畫面右邊。Lists this copied data on the right side of the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形路徑。Creates a graphics path. - 填入幾個基本類型和一些標記。Populates it with several primitives and some markers. - 列出在螢幕左邊的路徑資料。Lists the path data on the left side of the screen. - 建立和倒轉它。Creates a and rewinds it. - 遞增至第二個標記的 path 資料索引。Increments the path data index to the second marker. - 呼叫方法，以路徑將資料複製到`points`和`types`陣列。Calls the method to copy the path data to the `points` and `types` arrays. - 列出此複製的資料，在畫面右邊。Lists this copied data on the right side of the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#2)]

.method public hidebysig instance bool HasCurve() cil managed
Public Function HasCurve () As Boolean

summary.span: 指示與這個 關聯的路徑是否含有曲線。

span.span: Indicates whether the path associated with this contains a curve.

returns.span: 如果目前的子路徑含有曲線，則這個方法會傳回 ，否則傳回 。

span.span: This method returns if the current subpath contains a curve; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路徑中的所有曲線會都儲存成貝茲曲線序列。All curves in a path are stored as sequences of Bézier splines. 比方說，當您將橢圓形加入路徑時，您指定的左上角、 的寬度，以及橢圓形之週框矩形的高度。For example, when you add an ellipse to a path, you specify the upper-left corner, the width, and the height of the ellipse's bounding rectangle. 這些數字 （左上角、 寬度和高度） 不會儲存在路徑中;相反地，橢圓形會轉換成一連串的四個貝茲曲線。Those numbers (upper-left corner, width, and height) are not stored in the path; instead; the ellipse is converted to a sequence of four Bézier splines. 路徑儲存端點和那些貝茲曲線的控制點。The path stores the endpoints and control points of those Bézier splines. 路徑會儲存資料之點的陣列，其中每一個屬於一條線或貝茲曲線。A path stores an array of data points, each of which belongs to a line or a Bézier spline. 如果陣列中的點的一些屬於貝茲曲線，然後傳回`true`。If some of the points in the array belong to Bézier splines, then returns `true`. 如果陣列中的所有點都屬於行，然後傳回`false`。If all points in the array belong to lines, then returns `false`. 某些方法壓平合併的路徑，這表示在路徑中的所有曲線會都轉換成線條的序列。Certain methods flatten a path, which means that all the curves in the path are converted to sequences of lines. 已壓平合併的路徑之後，一律會傳回`false`。After a path has been flattened, will always return `false`. 呼叫， ，或方法類別會壓平合併的路徑。Calling the , , or method of the class will flatten a path. ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 會建立物件， `myPath`。Creates a object, `myPath`. - 新增三行、 矩形和橢圓形。Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse. - 會建立物件`myPath`。Creates a object for `myPath`. - 會測試目前的路徑`myPath`含有曲線。Tests to see if the current path `myPath` contains a curve. - 在訊息方塊會顯示測試的結果。Shows the result of the test in a message box. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 將 Iterator 移至路徑中的下一個資料標記。

span.span: Moves the iterator to the next marker in the path.

MemberSignature.Value: public int NextMarker (System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath path);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 NextMarker(class System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath path) cil managed
Public Function NextMarker (path As GraphicsPath) As Integer
public: int NextMarker(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::GraphicsPath ^ path);
member this.NextMarker : System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath -> int

param.name: path
param.span: 點複製至的 物件。

span.span: The object to which the points will be copied.

summary.span: 這個 具有與其相關聯的 物件。

span.span: This object has a object associated with it.

summary.span: 方法會將關聯的 遞增至其路徑中的下一個資料標記，並將目前資料標記和下一個資料標記 (或路徑端點) 之間包含的所有點複製至傳入至參數的第二個 物件。

span.span: The method increments the associated to the next marker in its path and copies all the points contained between the current marker and the next marker (or end of path) to a second object passed in to the parameter.

returns.span: 在這個資料標記和下一個資料標記之間的點數。

span.span: The number of points between this marker and the next.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來設定路徑中的標記。Use the method to set markers in a path. 標記用來建立群組的子路徑。Markers are used to create groups of subpaths. 一個或多個子路徑可以是兩個標記之間。One or more subpaths can be between two markers. ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 新增三個線條、 矩形、 橢圓形和兩個標記。Adds three lines, a rectangle, an ellipse, and two markers. - 列出所有的路徑指向左邊畫面的值。Lists the values of all the path's points to the left side of the screen. - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 會建立物件， `myPathSection`，以接收複製的點。Creates a object, `myPathSection`, to receive copied points. - 呼叫方法，它會逐一查看的第一個標記，並將包含該標記和下的一步 之間的所有點都複製`myPathSection`。Calls the method, which iterates to the first marker and copies all the points contained between that marker and the next to `myPathSection`. - 傳回的點數複製到`markerPoints`。Returns the number of points copied to `markerPoints`. - 列出的標記數目 （第一個標記） 和它包含在畫面右邊的點數目。Lists the marker number (the first marker) and number of points it contains to the right side of the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#4)]

returns.span: 在這個資料標記和下一個資料標記之間的點數。

span.span: The number of points between this marker and the next.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來設定路徑中的標記。Use the method to set markers in a path. 標記用來建立群組的子路徑。Markers are used to create groups of subpaths. 一個或多個子路徑可以是兩個標記之間。One or more subpaths can be between two markers. ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 新增三行、 矩形和橢圓形 ¾ 搭配標記之間。Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse ¾ with markers between each. - 繪製到螢幕的點陣列的值。Draws the values for the array of points to the screen. - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 呼叫 方法。Calls the method. - 會使用反覆呼叫所傳回的值繪製開始和停止針對至畫面的每個標記的點。Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to to draw the start and stop points for each marker to the screen. - 繪製到螢幕的總點數的值。Draws the value for the total number of points to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 新增三行、 矩形和橢圓形。Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse. - 列出所有資料點的左側螢幕的值。Lists the values of all the points to the left side of the screen. - 建立和倒轉它。Creates a and rewinds it. - 在 `for`迴圈，逐一查看使用的點和方法。In a `for` loop, iterates through the points using the and methods. - 列出子路徑數、 的點數，以及在畫面右側的路徑點類型會使用反覆進行的呼叫所傳回的值。Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to list the subpath number, the number of points in it, and the type of the path points to the right side of the screen. - 顯示畫面的總點數的值。Displays the value for the total number of points to the screen. 請注意，`ListPathPoints`是 helper 函式，用來分隔大部分 （並非全部） 的圖形路徑程式碼顯示程式碼。Note that `ListPathPoints` is a helper function that separates most (not all) of the display code from the graphics path code. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#6)]

returns.span: 如果沒有其他要擷取的圖形，則傳回零。

span.span: If there are no more figures to retrieve, zero is returned.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 新增三個線條、 矩形、 橢圓形和兩個標記。Adds three lines, a rectangle, an ellipse, and two markers. - 列出所有的路徑指向左邊畫面的值。Lists the values of all the path's points to the left side of the screen. - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 會建立物件， `myPathSection`，以接收複製的點。Creates a object, `myPathSection`, to receive copied points. - 呼叫方法，它會逐一查看直到第三個的子路徑 （圖），並將所包含的所有點的子路徑中的都複製`myPathSection`路徑，以及傳回的點數複製到`subpathPoints`。Calls the method, which iterates to the third subpath (figure) and copies all the points contained in that subpath to the `myPathSection` path, and also returns the number of points copied to `subpathPoints`. - 列出子路徑數和其包含在畫面右邊的點數目。Lists the subpath number and number of points it contains to the right side of the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`、事件物件。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 新增三行、 矩形和橢圓形。Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse. - 繪製到螢幕的點陣列的值。Draws the values for the array of points to the screen. - 建立 物件。Creates a object. - 呼叫 方法。Calls the method. - 會使用反覆呼叫所傳回的值繪製開始和停止每個畫面的子路徑的值。Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to to draw the start and stop values for each subpath to the screen. - 將子路徑的總數值繪製到螢幕。Draws the value for the total number of subpaths to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#8)]

summary.span: 將這個 回轉至其相關路徑的開始。

span.span: Rewinds this to the beginning of its associated path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次呼叫迭代器方法，它會取得第一個圖形 （子路徑） 的迭代器的相關聯的路徑。The first time you call the method of an iterator, it gets the first figure (subpath) of that iterator's associated path. 第二次，它會取得第二個圖中，依此類推。The second time, it gets the second figure, and so on. 當您呼叫方法，序列會啟動; 也就是您呼叫之後，下次呼叫取得路徑中的第一個圖形。When you call the method, the sequence starts over; that is, after you call , the next call to gets the first figure in the path. 和方法具有類似的行為。The and methods behave similarly.
